attributes.action: Ban fireworks being sold to the public.
attributes.additional_details: The amount of suffering being caused to animals, both domestic and wildlife. The suffering off the owners of pets and the costs to help our pets suppress their anxieties.
attributes.background: Stop the sales of fireworks to members of the public unless it's a proven display, even then it can only be a display for the night, ie: 5th November ect..

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630556
